metadata.Title: CVE-2022-44572 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: A denial of service vulnerability in the multipart parsing component ofRack fixed in 2.0.9.2, 2.1.4.2, 2.2.4.1 and 3.0.0.1 could allow an attackertocraft input that can cause RFC2183 multipart boundary parsing in Rack totake an unexpected amount of time, possibly resulting in a denial ofservice attack vector. Any applications that parse multipart posts usingRack (virtually all Rails applications) are impacted.

criterions.comment: ruby-rack package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
